    • Method Detail

      • setVoltage

        void setVoltage(double voltage,
                IMotor.Direction direction)
        Set the voltage of the motor.
        Parameters:
        voltage - The voltage in volts.
        direction - The direction of the motor.

      • setVoltage

        void setVoltage(double voltage)
        Set the voltage of the motor. Negative voltages are assumed to be Backward direction.
        Parameters:
        voltage - The voltage in volts.

      • getVoltage

        double getVoltage()
        Get the voltage of the motor.
        Returns:
        The voltage in volts.

      • setPWM

        void setPWM(double pwm,
            IMotor.Direction direction)
        Set the PWM proportion of the motor
        Parameters:
        pwm - The pwm from 0 to 1.
        direction - The direction of the motor.

      • setPWM

        void setPWM(double pwm)
        Set the PWM proportion of the motor. Negative proportions are assumed to be Backward direction.
        Parameters:
        pwm - The pwm from -1 to 1.

      • getPWM

        double getPWM()
        Get the PWM proportion of the motor.
        Returns:
        The PWM proportion of the motor from 0 to 1.

      • getDirection

        IMotor.Direction getDirection()
        Get the direction of the motor.
        Returns:
        The direction of the motor.

      • setInverted

        void setInverted(boolean inverted)
        Sets if the motor is inverted.
        Parameters:
        inverted - True if inverted, false otherwise.

      • isInverted

        boolean isInverted()
        Determines if the motor is inverted.
        Returns:
        True if inverted, false otherwise.

      • follow

        void follow(IMotor motor)
        Follow the movement of another motor.
        Parameters:
        motor - The motor to follow.

      • unfollow

        void unfollow(IMotor motor)
        Unfollow the movement of another motor.
        Parameters:
        motor - The motor to unfollow.

      • addFollower

        void addFollower(IMotor motor)
        Add a follower.
        Parameters:
        motor - The motor which will follow this motor.

      • removeFollower

        void removeFollower(IMotor motor)
        Remove a follower.
        Parameters:
        motor - The motor which will unfollow this motor.
